entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -19.4°C

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 26. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
